ECG_findings: Biphasic T wave in right precordial leads V1 and V2

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially observed high-grade atrioventricular block associated with Lyme carditis, with improvement in fevers and resolution of type 1 Brugada's pattern, but first-degree atrioventricular block remained.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Continued symptomatic complete heart block with intermittent pauses.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptomatic complete heart block persisted despite antibiotic treatment.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Normal atrioventricular conduction observed upon pacing device removal.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Resolution of symptoms and ventricular arrhythmias per pacemaker interrogation.
